summary: The implementation covers all major requirements for a drop shipping management application. The backend (main.mo) implements product catalog, order management, supplier management, and profit calculations using Motoko in a single actor. The frontend provides a complete React/TypeScript interface with Tailwind CSS styling, including all required pages (Dashboard, Products, Orders, Suppliers) with appropriate CRUD operations and search functionality. The design uses a warm color scheme (amber/orange) avoiding blue/purple as specified. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the implementation evidence.

missing_requirements.reason: While the backend provides addSupplier and getAllSuppliers functions, there is no updateSupplier or editSupplier function implemented in backend/main.mo. The frontend includes AddSupplierForm but no edit supplier functionality.

missing_requirements.requirement: Users can view order history and filter by status
missing_requirements.reason: While orders can be displayed and status updated, there is no visible filtering mechanism in the Orders page implementation. The backend provides getAllOrdersSortedByTimestamp but no filterOrdersByStatus function.
